column4: I have my own camera driver and I get the following error: Cannot open '/dev/video0': 11, Resource temporarily unavailable
Have you restarted, cycled, etc?
I take it you just rebooted.
Yes I did reboot in order to try to fix the same problem
But it did not work
Problems on other computers?
I had this problem several times with this application on computer and also other computers
I had this problem several times with this application on my computer and also other computers
Is it just the camera having problems?
Nope
Did you try it on windows?
I tried it with a different camera also
No the driver is only for Linux
I mean the camera is working at the moment
I mean the camera is working at the moment on Ubuntu
But not with my own implemented application
Oh.  Can't help you with your own apps.
I think as I have searched on the internet this is a common problem
for example it happens with cheese also
and is not related to my application
Could you please suggest what you would do if this was the case with cheese for example?
I haven't a clue.
